"Perhaps most moving of all is the case of the Children's Bureau which is hesitatingly agitating for funds
to reduce the rate of maternal mortality. A great deal
has been said lately about the importance of battleships
in defending our tuitional honor. It is a fair question to
ask what, honor a community can have when it is too
stingy to give its womenfolk decent care at childbirth.
"We have been told by nevispapers that the United
States is a rich country, and unlike Germany and Italy—
can afford a great naval program and never miss the
money. It isn't true. We are not obliged, perhaps, to
choose literally between cannon or butter, but we do
have,. to Choose between battleships, which are'dead
economic waste, and the severai thousand public works
projects now locked up in Washington which in many
cases would be revenue producers, and in every case
would make this country healthier and more civilized."
J.M.-K.

"Perhaps most moving of all is the case of the Children's Bureau which is hesitatingly agitating for funds
to reduce the rate of maternal mortality. A great deal
has been said lately about the importance of battleships
in defending our tuitional honor. It is a fair question to
ask what, honor a community can have when it is too
stingy to give its womenfolk decent care at childbirth.
"We have been told by nevispapers that the United
States is a rich country, and unlike Germany and Italy—
can afford a great naval program and never miss the
money. It isn't true. We are not obliged, perhaps, to
choose literally between cannon or butter, but we do
have,. to Choose between battleships, which are'dead
economic waste, and the severai thousand public works
projects now locked up in Washington which in many
cases would be revenue producers, and in every case
would make this country healthier and more civilized."
